articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: Alphabet won’t talk about the Google-Apple AI deal, even to investors - TechCrunch
articles.description: Alphabet CEO skipped an analyst's question about Apple on the company's earnings call.
articles.content: Alphabet declined to answer one of its investors during questions about Google’s AI deal with Apple on Wednesday’s fourth-quarter earnings call. Instead of responding to an analyst’s question about h… [+2288 chars]

articles.author: Lucas Ropek
articles.title: The Wayback Machine debuts a new plug-in designed to fix the internet's broken links problem - TechCrunch
articles.description: Should a linked web page go offline, the new feature will then redirect readers to the archived versions, so that there is no drop in service. The tool also archives a user's own posts, helping to ensure their longevity.
articles.content: The Internet Archive is a nonprofit that as you might expect is devoted to archiving the internet and preserving digital context for future generations. This week, the platform announced a new tool d… [+1915 chars]

articles.author: Shona Ghosh, Daniel Basteiro
articles.title: Europe Takes On Tech With Social Media Bans and Paris Raid on X - Bloomberg
articles.description: European countries are taking their broadest swipe yet at social media, with a growing number weighing bans of the services for minors and setting the stage for a new showdown with some of the biggest US companies.
